attractions.name: Angkor Wat
attractions.description: Largest religious monument in the world, with site measuring 162.6 hectares.

attractions.name: Bagan Ancient Temples
attractions.description: Largest concentration of Buddhist temples in the world, many of which were built in the 1000s and 1100s.

attractions.name: Acropolis
attractions.description: Dating from between the 5th and 4th century BC and dominating the site, the Parthenon is the largest and most recognizable structure from this period and symbolizes the extensive history of this country.

attractions.name: Mesa Verde National Park
attractions.description: Mesa Verde is home to one of the most visually stunning archeological sites in the USA and some of the most well preserved Indian ruins in North America.

attractions.name: Petra
attractions.description: This ancient capital city of the Nabataeans has roots that trace back to as early as the 4th or 5th century BC.

attractions.name: Chichen Itza
attractions.description: Chichén Itzá is a world-famous complex of Mayan ruins on Mexico's Yucatán Peninsula.
